Text:
HR .. I've always kept up with ur work and they're really great but I couldn't any longer since u haven't been been doing "handhelds" lately so will you PLEASE do your recents in "handheld" 

THANK YOU!!

Stop complaining.  You have no idea how much time and effort goes into providing these.

Download the HD version.  There isn't any reason to get the Low RES version (other than you want to watch on an OLD iPod).   If you have at least a 128KB downstream you will have no problems getting these videos in around 6-8hrs.

-HR

Thanks so much for all the time and effort you put into uploading all these movies!! Its because of you that I now have a 500GB external hard drive full of  your HD movies. No complaints here HR, YOU ROCK!
Thanks for this and the latest batch! Awesome work!

ive always prefered your highres stuff to put on my 16GB galaxy tab 7, finally took the plunge and bought a 64GB iphone4s and an appletv, WOW awesome cant believe ive been missing out on this, all because of you HR, huge respect your way bro
